text: Iordanis Paschalidis (born 1 February 1967) is a Greek yacht racer who competed in the 2004 Summer Olympics and in the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Greece Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Tornado Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Tornado Category:Tornado class world champions Category:World champions in sailing for Greece
title: Iordanis Paschalidis
